Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 64 off 44 deliveries
KL Rahul returned to form with a 32-ball 50
Hasan Mahmud (3/47) was the pick of the bowlers for Bangladesh
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Adelaide, Australia
